root.query: SELECT `objects`.profile_id, `objects`.oid, `keywords`.keyword, `terms`.`content_en` AS `content`, `indexing_keyword_tag`.is_indexed, `indexing_keyword_tag`.is_stored, `objects`.`mark` AS `realMark` FROM (SELECT * FROM `objects` WHERE (objects.profile_id >= ?) AND (objects.profile_id < ?)) as objects INNER JOIN `obj_def` ON objects.oid=obj_def.oid INNER JOIN `keywords` ON obj_def.keywordsID=keywords.keywordsID INNER JOIN `terms` ON objects.termid=terms.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT indexing_keyword_tag.* FROM `indexing_keyword_tag` INNER JOIN `indexing_tags` ON indexing_tags.id =indexing_keyword_tag.tag_id AND indexing_tags.tag = 'default') as indexing_keyword_tag ON keywords.keywordsID=indexing_keyword_tag.keywordsID ORDER BY `profile_id` ASC, `cid` DESC
